messages.message:
fyi many of you have seen `ESOCKETTIMEDOUT` errors in your Cypress CI runs (example from Weiming's PR (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/20319/overview/7ec99be6-6689-455d-9a2b-81d6b12fbdc4?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1))

previously, this went away when Sean restarted calico (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1740094066665729?thread_ts=1740079704.302349&cid=C05L87V014J), which manages our network policies in deployed environments

i've asked @astpierre to do this for crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com (http://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com) now to see if this eliminates the recent `ESOCKETTIMEDOUT` errors in Cypress CI

calico has been restarted :white_check_mark:

please report if you still see `ESOCKETTIMEDOUT` errors in Cypress CI!
